page.title: 10Young People of Sydling
page.content: The village has a lively group of young children, under sixteen, who are an asset to the place. They would like more sports facilities, such as a tennis court, swimming pool, football pitch and a field for motor cycle scrambling. Also suggested was a coffee bar or permanent meeting place. At the present time the bus shelter (which does not get much use as there are so few buses) is the meeting place for all the young folk and the cross roads by the chestnut tree is the football ground. The young people appreciate many of the same things about our village life as their elders; the tranquillity, the natural beauty, the security and the friendly atmosphere.
